CHAT.comment: Book Reading; The Very Hungry Caterpillar

Chi reads pretty steadily with small pauses between most words. Baby brother keeps Mot pretty busy. Chi speeds up during fruit section. Has trouble reading some of the words in the end but doesn't seem to get frustrated. Slows down and sounds out words.
MOT Chi and baby brother sitting on floor

u.a: Chi , MOT and a brother sit on floor
baby babbling throughout - closer to tape than Chi , naturally
Chi follows words with her finger
doorbell rings and Mot gets up to answer the door
